content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage System (around position 41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0) mining coal
- Input wooden chest (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Two iron chests for storage (41.5, -84.5) and (41.5, -83.5), both full with 1600 coal each

### Iron Smelting System (around position 45-47, -81)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (45.0, -81.0) and (47.0, -81.0)
- Iron ore input chest (45.5, -79.5) containing 22 iron ore
- Iron plate output chest (49.5, -80.5) containing 1500 iron plates
- Two burner inserters:
  - First inserter at (44.5, -79.5) configured to move items from (44.5, -80.5) to (44.5, -78.5)
  - Second inserter at (46.5, -79.5) configured to move items from (46.5, -80.5) to (46.5, -78.5)
- Additional wooden chest at (45.5, -84.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Before placing entities, verify the target location is clear of other objects
- When placing inserters, ensure the target coordinates don't overlap with existing structures

### System Configuration Issues
- The furnaces are showing "no ingredients to smelt" warnings despite having fuel, suggesting issues with the inserter configuration or material flow
- One furnace is showing "furnace fuel source is full" warning, indicating potential inefficiencies in the fuel distribution system

## NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- `first_ore_inserter`: BurnerInserter
- `second_ore_inserter`: BurnerInserter

### System Status Variables
- Mining drill fuel level: {'coal': 15}
- Coal chest inventory: {'coal': 608}
- Iron ore chest inventory: {'iron-ore': 22}
- First furnace fuel: {'coal': 50}
- Second furnace fuel: {'coal': 49}

The system appears to be partially operational but requires optimization of material flow between components.
